main.welcome-desc: Piclab is a powerful tool to manage your personal photos supercharged with AI. It enables to identify photo duplicates, find photos of someone based on face detection or create cool posters from your own photos. And all of this without sending your photos to a cloud!

projectConfiguration.step-1: The first step for project configuration consists in picking up the top-level folder which contains all images to analyze. This folder may contain many images, other folders, sub-folders, etc.
projectConfiguration.step-2: The second step consists in selecting the analyses that you want to perform on the images. You can select one or more analyses.
